fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: Do the major print and broadcast media represent a wide range of political perspectives?

fxInfo_responses.value: The major media represent only the governmentâ€™s perspective.
The major media represent only the perspectives of the government and a governmentapproved, semi-official opposition party.
The major media represent a variety of political perspectives but they systematically ignore at least one political perspective that is important in this society.
All perspectives that are important in this society are represented in at least one of the major media.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
